answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Can you elaborate on the diagnosis of cancer and the particular injection you mentioned? While diabetes and other medical conditions may co-exist, it is important that management plan of both cancer and diabetes is discussed with the attending physician. Take care and hope to hear from you soon. Best regards.
